sentences: Cillian Vallely is an Irish musician, born in Armagh, Northern Ireland.
Since 1999, he has been a member of the band Lúnasa with whom he has recorded seven albums.
In the past couple of years, he has worked on various collaborations between traditional and classical music, along with his brother Niall and the composer Micheal O’Suilleabhain.
In January 2014, he played uilleann pipes, low whistle and tin whistle on the Bruce Springsteen album High Hopes, which topped the charts in 14 countries.
